title: CanÂ´t read my tickets messages
body:
The problem is that I got some problems with my account and I send a ticket. It seems like Riot sent me a message back but I cant read it, I cant even read my messages.
Could somenone help me? Thanks.
Sorry if my english is bad, it is not my native language :P

replies.body: Is it for an account recovery case?  If your email was changed or you don't have access to the account then you might not see your responses.  If this is the case for you, try our [account recovery ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead while making sure to input an email you do have access to.  Hope that helps!
